name: MAYA CAPT. QUEST SURVIVAL SAGA
description: MAYA CAPT. QUEST SURVIVAL SAGA  is a 2D  PC game, It is a challenging game for game lovers as the insight theme is the search of daughter to find her father's trail of quest in a mission Dooma. Captain Maya is the fearless and challenge loving character which gamers will love to play for ................. The captain Maya ship enters into Black hole leading to a new dimension portal landing on alien planet which is the past link to her father captain OMI Sky warrior. This is the chance to find what has happened there? Will she finds her father? What unknown challenges she is going to face? Highly exciting full of thrill and hardship that will raise your excitement as a gamer don't miss it!! The exciting journey is waiting.....!!
